creator: Connected Living, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Connected Living Community (CLC) is designed specifically for senior living residents, their families and friends. Users can connect directly to their communities to stay current with the most important information – calendars, dining menus, photos and more - and can utilize the private social feed to communicate with family and friends, share photos and enhance their quality of life.

CLC's most exciting feature - “Time Capsule” - allows users to capture their life stories in an easy-to-use, interactive format. Among other key features, you and your inner circle can easily use Connected Living for:

Accessing Community Information - Calendars, Menus, Photos, Alerts

Socializing - Private social networking capabilities with your inner circle of friends and family

Peace of Mind – Ability to share locations privately and get alerts when family or friends come and go from specific locations (i.e. “Mom’s place”)

Convenience: Access to features such as Lyft transportation, personal concierge services, personalized photo products, and more.

Connected Living Community includes a subscription upgrade that can provide some of our users access to two additional pieces of functionality.

1) Unlimited “Locations” – Our app lets users set up “Locations”. These Locations allow the user to receive alerts when their family and friends come and go from those locations. Free users have the ability to set up one location, while upgraded users can create unlimited locations.

2) The ability to access a 24/7/365 personal concierge - Users who choose to upgrade to the personal concierge gain access to that phone number within the app.

Subscription options are either $7.49 / month or $74.99 / Year.

Payment is charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase.

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

Accounts are charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Renewal cost dependent on the subscription selected ($7.49/month or $74.99/year).

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

For more information on our privacy policy and terms and conditions visit http://connectedliving.com/privacy

Please note, continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
descriptionShort: Connected Living Community

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for using Connected Living Community! We update our app regularly to make it better and easier to use. This update includes:

- The ability to print and save community resources.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- Sorting of Community Resources

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

Connected Living accesses your contact list to help you find any matching contacts using Connected Living. To do this, we upload your contact to our servers to find the matches, but do not save any of your contact information.
descriptionShort: Connected Living Community is a social networking app for Senior Living.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Thank you for using Connected Living Community. In this release we now require our users to provide affirmative consent each time the app would like to access your contact list.

Socializing - Private social networking capabilities with your inner circle of friends and family

Peace of Mind – Ability to share locations privately and get alerts when family or friends come and go from specific locations (i.e. “Mom’s place”)

Convenience: Access to features such as Lyft transportation, personal concierge services, personalized photo products, and more.

Connected Living Community includes a subscription upgrade that can provide some of our users access to two additional pieces of functionality.

1) Unlimited “Locations” – Our app lets users set up “Locations”. These Locations allow the user to receive alerts when their family and friends come and go from those locations. Free users have the ability to set up one location, while upgraded users can create unlimited locations.

2) The ability to access a 24/7/365 personal concierge - Users who choose to upgrade to the personal concierge gain access to that phone number within the app.

Subscription options are either $7.49 / month or $74.99 / Year.

Payment is charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase.

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

Accounts are charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Renewal cost dependent on the subscription selected ($7.49/month or $74.99/year).

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

For more information on our privacy policy and terms and conditions visit http://connectedliving.com/privacy

Please note, continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Connected Living accesses your contact list to help you find any matching contacts using Connected Living. To do this, we upload your contact to our servers to find the matches, but do not save any of your contact information.
descriptionShort: Connected Living Community is a social networking app for Senior Living.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Thank you for using Connected Living Community. In this release we have improved the load time for resident directories.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

For more information on our privacy policy and terms and conditions visit http://connectedliving.com/privacy

Please note, continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Connected Living accesses your contact list to help you find any matching contacts using Connected Living. To do this, we upload your contact to our servers to find the matches, but do not save any of your contact information.
descriptionShort: Connected Living Community is a social networking app for Senior Living.

title: Connected Living Community

creator: Connected Living, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Connected Living Community (CLC) is designed specifically for senior living residents, their families and friends. Users can connect directly to their communities to stay current with the most important information – calendars, dining menus, photos and more - and can utilize the private social feed to communicate with family and friends, share photos and enhance their quality of life.

CLC's most exciting feature - “Time Capsule” - allows users to capture their life stories in an easy-to-use, interactive format. Among other key features, you and your inner circle can easily use Connected Living for:

Accessing Community Information - Calendars, Menus, Photos, Alerts

Socializing - Private social networking capabilities with your inner circle of friends and family

Peace of Mind – Ability to share locations privately and get alerts when family or friends come and go from specific locations (i.e. “Mom’s place”)

Convenience: Access to features such as Lyft transportation, personal concierge services, personalized photo products, and more.

Connected Living Community includes a subscription upgrade that can provide some of our users access to two additional pieces of functionality.

1) Unlimited “Locations” – Our app lets users set up “Locations”. These Locations allow the user to receive alerts when their family and friends come and go from those locations. Free users have the ability to set up one location, while upgraded users can create unlimited locations.

2) The ability to access a 24/7/365 personal concierge - Users who choose to upgrade to the personal concierge gain access to that phone number within the app.

Subscription options are either $7.49 / month or $74.99 / Year.

Payment is charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase.

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

Accounts are charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Renewal cost dependent on the subscription selected ($7.49/month or $74.99/year).

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

For more information on our privacy policy and terms and conditions visit http://connectedliving.com/privacy

Please note, continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Connected Living accesses your contact list to help you find any matching contacts using Connected Living. To do this, we upload your contact to our servers to find the matches, but do not save any of your contact information.
